name: Atomic Time Zone File
summary: Learn about .ATZ files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Atomic Time Zone is a program developed to provide accurate times based on International Atomic Time (TAI) for different time zones worldwide. The program is discontinued and unavailable for download, making ATZ files extremely rare. However, you can find the ATZ file in the Atomic Time Zone installation directory if you have installed the program on your computer.

description: An ATZ file is a data file used by Atomic Time Zone, an application that keeps track of the current time by checking with several "atomic clocks" via the Internet. It contains a list of active Atomic Time Zone servers from around the world that the program references.

instructions: ATZ files are not meant to be manually opened. Instead, Atomic Time Zone references the ATZ file to load the information about the active servers.
